Package org.apache.logging.log4j.spi

Class AbstractScopedContextProvider.Instance

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.AbstractScopedContextProvider.Instance
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScopedContext.Instance
Enclosing class:
AbstractScopedContextProvider
protected static class AbstractScopedContextProvider.Instance extends Object implements ScopedContext.Instance
When an Instance is created it may contain a Key/Value pair from a Where method. When a run method is called a Map will be created and all the Key/Value pairs from parent instances will be added to it along with all the keys from the first Instance encountered that contains a Map. In this way we avoid continually copying Maps in order to add a single Key/Value pair.
